<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pack Tactics](/Feats.aspx?ID=2495) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Beastkin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=337" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 81 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

You have mastered how to hunt with your pack. If an enemy is within reach of you and at least two of your allies, that enemy is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against you.
name: Pack Tactics
